page.topic: List of Names formatted like a Columnar List
page.description: Displays a list of names styled using a Columnar List template built using Client-Side Template syntax.
page.discussion: The ViewBox control can be used to create a light-weight alternative to a List Control. In this sample, the ViewBox displays a list of customers that can be selected. When a customer record is clicked, the row is highlighted to indicate the selected record.

section.description: The List of Names formatted like a Columnar List template example is loaded by clicking the Load Sample ViewBox link on the Home tab of the ViewBox Builder.
